message: Hi Bob, Iâ€™m offering you this exceptional product for $14500. I believe it stands out in quality and will be a great addition for you. Let me know if this works for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While the product looks good, $14500 is a bit higher than I was hoping to spend. Would you consider $12000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, and I'd be comfortable closing the deal at $13500. I'm confident you'll find the product worth every penny at this price. Let me know your thoughts.
Thanks for coming down a bit, Alice. $13500 is still more than I'm comfortable with. My budget is really around $12500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
